'''Mythcon 41''' was the forty-first annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "War in Heaven"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Janet Brennan Croft]] (editor of [[Mythlore]]), and Tim Powers (fantasy author)
